duties_responsibilities.duty: Engaging clients in the lobby to educate and assist with conducting transactions through self-service resources such as mobile banking, online banking, or ATM.
Accurately and efficiently processes cash transactions for clients as needed.
Having deep conversations with clients to gain in-depth knowledge of their financial and life priorities.
Building relationships with individual clients to meet their financial needs.
Following established processes and guidelines in daily activities to do what is right for clients and the bank, adhering to all applicable laws and regulations.
Partnering with experts in small business, lending, and investments to grow business knowledge and network.
Managing financial center traffic, appointments, and outbound calls effectively.
Driving the client experience and managing cash responsibilities.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or business relevant associate degree such as business management, business administration, or finance.
